ygData.subject: Re: Confession Of a Monk P2
ygData.msgSnippet: Just a refresh that I ended with Ok, enough of my biase rantings. ... From: LKW  Err, we wizards wear only clothes.Armor mean nothing
ygData.messageBody:
Just a refresh that I ended with "Ok, enough of my biase rantings."
----- Original Message -----
From: LKW <leekw13@...>
Err, we wizards wear only clothes.Armor mean nothing much to us, coz full
clothes armor only add less than 20ac to us.

>>Opps, forgot. But I *believe* at later stages hor, you can get much better
armour. I will try to assist you in finding out if I ever get the chance.

The only true weap we got is our spells ;)

>>I heard tanking was tough? Or do your use pets?

So far I never asked any pple for armor/weap after I died - since they
doesn't help much and I'm prepare to die again in the course of retrieving
my corpse, hehe, so dun waste others' money ;)

>>Cool! Same pattern as you.

H/w, I've just shifted house last wekkend and now my house is in a mess -
Hopefully u guys dun increase lvl too much, so that I can
still group with u guys, hahahahahahahah ;-?

>>Aiyo! Don't worry! We can still group no matter what ;-) but not for too
long if the gap is REAL big...

Wilson aka Yutaka
